definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The airless Mexican walked boldly out.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥禿子大模大樣地走了出去。

sentences.english: I saw him swaggering along the street in his new suit.
sentences.chinese: 我看見他穿着一身新衣服大模大樣地在街上走。
她大模大樣的走出了房間。

sentences.english: Don't go in a straight line anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 不要大模大樣走到任何地方。
